Package controller

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AdminController

  • public class AdminController
extends java.lang.Object
    The Admin Controller manipulates the user list and feeds new updates into the view.
    Author:
    Ayush Joshi, Anil Tilve

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AdminController​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void handleAddButton​()
      Calls the disableInput function to enable the field to let user input the username.
      void handleCancelButton​()
      Confirms the cancellation of the action when trying to add a new user.
      void handleConfirmButton​()
      On confirm the new user is checked into the list of users and if exist an error is thrown otherwise the user is added to users list.
      void handleDeleteUserButton​()
      Confirms if the user wants to delete a user and then remove the user from the users list.
      void handleListUsersButton​()
      Makes the users visible on click.
      void handleLogoutButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      On event, loads the login screen.
      void start​(java.util.ArrayList<User> users)
      On start the users are initialized.

        public void handleCancelButton​()

      • handleConfirmButton

        public void handleConfirmButton​()
        On confirm the new user is checked into the list of users and if exist an error is thrown otherwise the user is added to users list. Save the data
